page.title: 07LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: Earls Gift Castle,Donemana,is just one of Tyrone's many pieces of history. Its story began in the early 1600's when Sir Drummond was granted 1,000 acres of land at Donemana.Here he started the town of Donemana where he built 10 wickerwork houses in 1619. Some 20 years later Sir John decided to build a castle near his home at Earls Gift.Like most landlords of his time he had a town house in London and it was there that he met and fell in love with a beautiful French girl. They planned to marry and live in the castle near Donemana when it was completed. However,the tragic circumstances which followed left Sir John a man broken in health and spirit.
